channel.title: ★ RenegadePS ★ VPS ★ Stable Economy ★ Prestiges ★ Bosses ★ Minigames ★ Skills ★
channel.description:
[b][size=12pt][font=arial]RenegadePS is an Economy based server. This server's main focus is to give players what THEY want. Unlike other hosts who only want to take your money, RenegadePS gives players the opportunity to let them, in other words, run the server. Renegade's development team updates the server based on a players' suggestion. Here at RenegadePS, we take into consideration what you want in the game, and what you don't want[/font][/size].[/b]
[URL=http://"http://renegadeps.com/"][SIZE=5]Website[/SIZE][/URL]
[URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192628028/Renegade%20PS.jar"][SIZE=5]Client[/SIZE][/URL]
[size=12pt][font=arial][b]Features[/b][/font][/size] :
[font=arial][b][b]- All skills working (That includes summoning,runecrafting,slayer, etc)
- Unique home location
- Active staff & friendly community
- Tons of bosses to slay
- Pk Point System
- Automated vote system
- Donation system with instant claims
- Different types of currency
- Good money making methods
- Stable economy
- Donators actually have a benefit
- Fully clipped system (Including combat)
- Over 20+ Shops
- Old and new armor looks available
- X100 Hits (With splashmarks)
- Updates are made based on a players' suggestion.
- 100% Curses (Including quick prays)
- Dual wielding
- Minigames
- Server events
- 100% UpTime
- Boss pets
- Completionist/Max cape available
- Maximum experience is 200m in a skill
- And many more ! Come check us out ![/b][/b][/font]
[size=12pt][font=arial][b]Media[/b][/font][/size] :
